Body:
FF = op.algorithms.metrics.FormationFactor(network=self.net)
Ps = self.net.pores('left')
self.net.set_label(pores=Ps, label='blah')
FF.set_inlets(direction='x', label='blah')
FF.run()
val_1 = FF.results['x']
FF.set_inlets(direction='x', label='left')
FF.run()
val_2 = FF.results['x']
assert val_1 == val_2
